WorkItem.Description:
Issue:
The filters for Blackwing Descent - Omnitron Defense System are not working when checked on/off.
 
Version:
4.0.17.0b
 
Replication:
-Utilizing attached character sheet; Gear -> Head; Power Generator Hood
-Filter -> Tier 11 Raids -> Blackwing Descent -> Omnitron Defense System (unchecked)
 
Expected Results:
Power Generation Hood [372] should not be showing
 
Suggested Fix:
- When item is updated through Wowhead item pulls source from Blackwing Descent (25H) -> Toxitron.
- Suggest making default filters include source for Omnitron Defense System as Toxitron, Magmatron, and Arcanotron
WorkItem.Summary: [ItemFilters] Blackwing Descent - Omnitron Defense System Don't Work

Comments.Message: The suggestion for dividing the "Omnitron Defense System" and it's individual Boss Drops is a good idea. As for being able to replicate your findings for the "Power Generation Hood", upon refreshing from wowhead, I get "Not Found on Armory" so there was no information to filter. I will continue to monitor this issue, but it may also be an issue for the parcing team.

Interesting that it show "Not Found on Armory" because last night and I updated from WoWHead to get stored values in my xml.  Maybe this is two issues, one with the parce team and filtering.  Thanks for taking a look.

The problem right now is items from Omnitron drop from multiple bosses (Toxitron and Arcanotron share drop loots, I believe those two are correct). However the the wowhead import doesn't support definitively multiple source information. Because of this, it is having issues. I added manually the source information for Omnitron. Same problem with Valiona & Theralion. Some items drop from both of them (though not all).
